CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Initial Consultation stage positioned above or below the Diagnostic Testing stage?
SRP.A: The Initial Consultation stage is positioned {above} the Diagnostic Testing stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Initiated?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Initiated is {286}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnostic Testing?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnostic Testing is {1000}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed is {630}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {1631}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Completed, with a value of {239}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {631} Patients from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {370} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to stage Treatment Recommended?
SC.A: Decreased by {261} Patients from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to stage Treatment Recommended.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 815? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Consultation} stage has {1631}, the {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {1000}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 262? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 327 and 815? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {630}, the {Treatment Recommended} stage has {369}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Recommended} to {Treatment Initiated} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, or from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to {Diagnostic Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to stage {Diagnostic Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Consultation} and {Diagnostic Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Initiated} and {Treatment Completed} stages.
